verses.name: Ezekiel 30:8
verses.text: And they shall know that I am the Lord, when I have set a fire in Egypt, and when all her helpers shall be destroyed.

verses.name: Ezekiel 30:9
verses.text: In that day shall messengers go forth from me in ships to make the careless Ethiopians afraid, and great pain shall come upon them, as in the day of Egypt: for, lo, it cometh.

verses.name: Ezekiel 30:10
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord God; I will also make the multitude of Egypt to cease by the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon.
